Build-Depends: debhelper (>= 9.0.0), libvanessa-logger-dev (>= 0.0.10), libvanessa-adt-dev (>= 0.0.6), libvanessa-socket-dev (>= 0.0.12), libpopt-dev, libpam0g-dev, default-libmysqlclient-dev, libpq-dev, libgdbm-dev, libldap2-dev, zlib1g-dev, libssl-dev, unixodbc-dev, libdb-dev, libcdb-dev, libidn-dev, dpkg-dev (>= 1.16.1), dh-autoreconf, libnsl-dev
